data.name: Bonny Island IWD2020
data.description: International Women’s Day (IWD) is marked on March 8th every year. In different regions, the focus of celebrations ranges from general respect and appreciation toward women to a celebration of women’s economic, political, and social achievements. This is going to be the first of its kind in Bonny I…

relatedRecords.name: IWD Ilorin
relatedRecords.description:
IWD Ilorin 2020 This year we are bringing to you a remarkable and exciting International Women’s Day event geared towards women in an effort to advance their technical skills and solve issues related to creating a sustainable environment.
#WTMIlorin #GDGIlorin #WomenInTech #WomenTechmakers #WTM
